comments: If first two 1's are omitted, denominator of x coordinate of (2n+1)*P where P is generator for rational points on curve y^2 + y = x^3 - x.
references: B. Mazur, Arithmetic on curves, Bull. Amer Math. Soc. 14 (1986), 207-259; see p 225.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 14 2009
